evidence.claim: Aventura Software utilizes AWS for scalable cloud services.
The company advocates the use of HL7 and FHIR standards in their health integrations.
They employ RESTful APIs to facilitate communication between healthcare systems.
Aventura Software mentions support for HIPAA compliance in their infrastructure.
Integration patterns include webhooks for real-time data communication.

icp.icp_reason: No specific evidence of handling X12 transactions or acts as a clearinghouse found.
